TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TabRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用來呈現具有視覺化樣式的索引標籤控制項的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a tab control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可以用來呈現作業系統的目前視覺化樣式的索引標籤控制項的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a tab control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈現控制項是指繪製控制項的使用者介面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 這非常有用，如果要繪製自訂控制項應該具有目前視覺化樣式的外觀。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要繪製索引標籤控制項，請使用方法來繪製頁面上，並使用方法來繪製每個索引標籤。To draw a tab control, use the method to draw the page, and use the method to draw each tab. 如果已在作業系統中啟用視覺化樣式和視覺化樣式套用至應用程式視窗的工作區，這個類別的方法將會繪製目前視覺化樣式 索引標籤控制項。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the tab control with the current visual style. 否則，方法和屬性，這個類別會擲回。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要判斷是否可以使用這個類別的成員，請檢查值屬性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, check the value of the property. 這個類別會包裝的功能設定為其中一個所公開的項目類別。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立使用自訂控制項和繪製兩個索引標籤的基本 索引標籤控制項的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a basic tab control with two tabs. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TabRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 繪製用來在索引標籤控制項中選取頁面的索引標籤。

span.span: Draws a tab that is used to select a page in the tab control.

member this.IsSupported : bool

summary.span: 取得值，指出 類別是否可用來繪製具有視覺化樣式的索引標籤控制項。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the class can be used to draw a tab control with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果這個屬性是`false`，則並方法會擲回。If this property is `false`, the and methods will throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性來判斷是否要使用和方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to use the and methods. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
